# stopLoading()

**Instance Method**

Stops loading all resources on the current page.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor final func stopLoading()
```

## Managing the loading process

- **reload(fromOrigin:)**: Reloads the current webpage.
title: stopLoading()
